custom-meta.meta-value: The data supporting the conclusions and recommendations of this scientific article are included in the article, and additional data can be found in the subsection supporting information. The raw data will not be made publicly available because participants did not consent to have their full transcript available for the public. The data is available at the Department of Medical Microbiology, UMCG, Groningen and the Curaçao Biomedical & Health Research Institute for validation and verification purposes. Request to access the data can be sent to Ieneke van der Gun, e-mail address: b.t.f.van.der.gun01@umcg.nl and Eurydice Martina (project coordinator at Curaçao Biomedical & Health Research Institute) e-mail address: e.martina@cbhri.com.
